resources.string: this is the category title some text to test the appearance of the view It\'s time for a truly uncompromising smartphone. One that was designed and manufactured by technical enthusiasts - in close coordination with the future users. A smartphone that perfectly combines fascinating technology, groundbreaking design and breakthrough innovation. It is time for the OnePlus 3. But do not rely on our word. Convince yourself.
